description: Situated three kilometres east of Positano, this family-run restaurant has been in business for almost 60 years and is one of the most popular in the region – and for good reason. The classic-style dining room with a striking open-view kitchen adorned with local blue-and-white ceramics provides the setting for meat and fish dishes (mainly local) prepared from top-quality ingredients with the occasional personal touch.
